short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent others from seeing at your cards in real life. Hover to peek.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent others from seeing your cards in real life. By default, your cards are hidden from view. They only become visible when you hover over them with your mouse. Disabling the extension will make the cards always visible, but remember to refresh the page.
